thread.title: The surprising male body type women lust after most
thread.title_full: The surprising male body type women lust after most | New York Post

author: Natalie Keegan, The Sun
title: The surprising male body type women lust after most
text:
A porn website has revealed women’s most lusted-after body types — and six packs are not top of the list.
According to Pornhub, the male body types most women hankered after are “hairy” and “daddy.”
Ripped physiques were not what ladies searched for the most, a spokesman for the site told the Daily Star. Many women are partial to watching lesbians and threesomes as well.
And it also emerged that penis size really does matter.
Pornhub said: “Women searching for men of a particular type generally will use terms like ‘big d–k’ or ‘black/ebony.’”
But while these porn searches reveal a lot about the modern day woman’s desires, it seems ladies may be hardwired to prefer buff guys after all.
Evolutionary psychologist Nigel Barber told The Daily Star: “Women prefer men who are physically fit and about five inches taller than themselves and find protruding stomachs and baldness unattractive.”
Kindness was also seen as of key importance to a long-term relationship.
So what body type do you prefer?
